channel.title: How do i take the weather off my server
channel.description: how can i make the weather stop.. i tried ::nosnow but it only works for admins, can any one help plz.

item.title: How do i take the weather off my server
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Or, for me, I got a folder called Data. In there is a file called Weather. I go in there and change that number to 3. Your source might not be like that.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i take the weather off my server

item.title: How do i take the weather off my server
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Well, normally you could just search for it in the tutorial section, but…

Search for snowingzz1 in your client.java. Scroll around near there. You should see the right command.

Or, if you have a weather folder, just look through it or delete it.

Read full topic
